Function template find_if

boost::compute::find_if

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/compute/algorithm/find_if.hpp>


template<typename InputIterator, typename UnaryPredicate> 
  InputIterator 
  find_if(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, UnaryPredicate predicate, 
          command_queue & queue = system::default_queue());

Description

Returns an iterator pointing to the first element in the range [first, last) for which predicate returns true.

Space complexity: \Omega(1)
